From the brand

How did we get our start?

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Today, we are a company that has more than 200 staff and owns over 6 departments with its products popularly sold in 10 different countries. By 2022, our sales volume has reached 5,000,000. This is where we get our start.

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Tomxcute product accessories

Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0004-F
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ tomxcute
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09DSVFNRW

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

Warranty & Support

Price: $84.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:05:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CORDLESS & EASY-TO-STORE:  No external power supply is needed, VacLife portable air compressor with a rechargeable battery pack can help you inflate most inflatables anytime and anywhere. With its lightweight and compact size of 6.3*2.5*2.4inch, you can simply store this cordless air compressor in your backpack, pocket, and car center console and take it out for use anytime. Help yourself from now on, saving the trouble of going to the gas station to inflate your tires.
FAST INFLATING & NON-STOP WORKING: VacLife mini air compressor is perfect for daily needs or emergencies. This powerful tire pump is embedded with a high-efficiency motor providing an airflow of 30L/Min. It only takes 30s to inflate a mountain bike(0-36psi) and 1min to inflate a 205/55 R16 car tire (29-36psi). Moreover, with the turbofan providing good heat dissipation, this tire pump can work continuously without pause. Also, the upgraded air hose is more heat-resistant and easy to handle.
LARGE-CAPACITY & LONG-LASTING: VacLife cordless tire inflator is powered by three large-capacity batteries of 2,500mAh that can work continuously for up to 25mins. Once fully charged in 3-4 hours, this portable tire pump can inflate 6 car tires (205/55/R16) from 29 to 36psi. In addition, with multiple accessories, it is suitable for different inflatables, such as the tire of cars, motorcycles, bicycles, and balls. It is a great helper for you on the road.
4+N SMART MODES: VacLife portable air pump for car tires is convenient to use with 4+N smart modes, easily meeting your various inflating needs! (Please note that it is suitable for car tires with width ≤ 245mm and pressure ≤ 50psi.) The 4 preset modes are car mode, motorcycle mode, bike mode, and ball mode, which facilitate the operation of the new beginners. Moreover, the manual mode enables you to set the desired pressure from 2-160psi according to different inflatables.
LED DIGITAL DISPLAY & AUTO SHUTOFF: This tire inflator with portable design comes with a precise pressure gauge and a large LED digital display, enabling you to read the real-time pressure and the preset pressure at just a glance. You can also rest assured with the auto shutoff design. This car air pump will stop automatically once reached the preset pressure. No more over-inflating, it’s simple and safe.

Veken is dedicated to bringing our customers premium, high-quality, and functional household products, pet supplies and travel accessories at reasonable prices.

Our vision is to continuously innovate and improve our products based on customer needs as well as current industry trends. Our customer centric approach means customers always come first.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.4 x 8.4 x 5.3 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VK663
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Veken
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NC54VZN
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

High-quality: Made of food grade materials, this drinking fountain is BPA free, durable, and easy to operate and clean. The water-level window and LED Light let you observe how much water your pets drink in real time, and lets you see exactly when you need to fill the water bowl. There is a switch on the wire to control the light so you could easily turn it on or off.
Two flow designs: The Veken Pet Fountain has 2 modes: flower waterfall (faucet drinking) and the gentle fountain. The water streaming down the petals of the flower on the fountain will draw your pets attention and encourage animals to drink more often.
Triple-filtration system: In addition to keeping water fresh via circulation, the triple-filtration system, including activated carbon layer, ion exchange resin and thick non-woven fabric, keeps water better tasting and safer for pets.
Ultra-quiet pump: The pump on this water dispenser is ultra-quiet, has low-energy consumption and will last 1.5-2 years.

Benefits of Choosing Us

Appeal to your pet’s natural instincts

In the wild running water is often safer to drink than still water and your pet knows that. A water bowl sitting out near their food could be unappealing. Cats and dogs are naturally attracted to running water being dispensed from a fountain, appealing to their natural instincts.

Your right-hand man in life

2.8L is suitable for multiple pet homes. The fountain is very easy to operate and clean. If you are looking for an advanced water fountain or your pet has any drinking problems, Veken will be the right choice for you and your pet.

The third water flow setting

You can remove the cap to form a flower bubble to increase the water flow for pets to drink. This fountain has various flow modes so its easy to find the option that is best for your pet. When placing the cap on the flower, make sure the ridge aligns with the notch on the flower.

Read more

What You Will Get:

  • 1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.3 x 8.3 x 6.6in）
  • 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）
  • 1 x DC Pump （with a 6ft power cord）
  • 2 x Filters
  • 1 x Pre-filter Sponge
  • 1 x Instruction Manual

Cleaning the pump is essential to the longevity of the fountain. Please clean the pump at least every 2 weeks.

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the pump cover

Step 3. Remove the impeller

Step 4. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more





Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Replacement Filters 84oz Pet Fountain 100oz Pet Fountain Dog Grooming Kit 84oz Pet Fountain Replacement Pump

Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl.

4. To prevent the activated carbon dust (it will not harm your pets) from shedding, please soak the filter in water for 2 minutes and rinse it thoroughly under running water before use. It is recommended to flush the filter and sponge with water every time you change the water.

5. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, replace the filter and the sponge every 2 to 3 weeks.

6. Please place the pump inside the square indention and make sure the double probe face towards the clear window in the water bowl.

7. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

Product Description

SWANLAKE 200cc Fluid Extractor, Extraction&Fill Pump,Fluid Syringe Pump Manual Suction Vacuum Fuel Car Transfer,Brake Fluid Extractor

Filling/Extracting Pump is designed to remove and fill brake fluid, anti-freeze, gear oil, power steering fluid and more.

Heavy-duty construction allows for strength and durability.

The pump includes two a 7-Inch by 1/4-Inch (outer diameter) hose extension for deep reach and small diameter applications, locking cap on end of hose and a 7.5-Inch/19-Centimeter clear hose.

The hose attaches to quick-connect on the cylinder. Double seals for brake fluid and anti-freeze, assembled on the plunger.

Filling/Extracting Pump is designed to remove and fill brake fluid, anti-freeze, gear oil, power steering fluid and more.
The pump includes two a 7-Inch by 1/4-Inch (outer diameter) hose extension for deep reach and small diameter applications, locking cap on end of hose and a 7.5-Inch/19-Centimeter clear hose.
The hose attaches to quick-connect on the cylinder. Double seals for brake fluid and anti-freeze, assembled on the plunger.
Heavy-duty construction allows for strength and durability.

The Franklin Sports Mini Soccer goal set is the perfect all in one set for any young soccer player! This set comes with the Mini folding soccer goal, Mini Soccer ball, and inflation pump so you’ll have everything you need to get the game started. Lightweight and portable: This set is constructed from lightweight quick fold corner joints that fold & lock into place to easily assemble or break down in seconds; The lightweight design makes this goal easy to assemble, move and store in seconds

From the brand

Tire Inflator

Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor

【12V DC/110V AC Power Supply】YYTON air pump for car tires with a 12V car cigarette lighter plug as well as a wall plug for a 110V household socket, two ways of powering, ideal for indoor and travel use. We can use the wall plug when we are at home, and we can use the cigarette lighter car plug when we are outside, very convenient
【Strong Air Pressure for Quick inflation】The highest pressure of air compressor for car can reach 150ps. For car tire 195/60/R15 inflation from 0 to 36 PSI, it only takes about 4 minutes to complete the set pressure value. If multiple tires need to be inflated, we recommend allowing the air compressor to cool down for 5 minutes after 10 minutes of continuous operation
【Digital Display/Auto-Off】The portable air compressor with a large font digital display, four pressure units are available (psi, bar, kpa, kg/cm²), preset the value you want, when the preset pressure is reached , the device will automatically shut down, with this air compressor portable, you no longer have to worry about over-inflation affecting driving safety
【Long Cords and LED Lights】The DC and AC power cords for portable air compressors for car tires are 9.2 feet and 5.2 feet respectively, which is long enough to inflate anywhere you want, in addition, this tire inflation with LED light A portable air compressor can help you inflate or check your tires in low light conditions, making it easy for you to inflate your tires in the dark
【Multipurpose/Compact Design】The latest car air pump adopts a handle design, it is more convenient to carry, it is compact enough without taking up more space, the tire compressor is equipped with 4 kinds of nozzle adapters and 1 fuse, suitable for cars, mid-size SUVs, Bicycles, motorcycles, basketballs, air mattresses, swimming pool toys and other inflatable products. You can contact us at any time if you have any questions.

YYTON Tire Inflator Portable Air Compressor Multifunctional Electric Pump

AC/DC Dual Stream Electric Air Pump

  • Voltage: household 110V/car 12V
  • Display unit: psi, bar, kpa, kg/cm²
  • Maximum air pressure: 150PSI
  • Automatic shutdown: yes
  • LED: 12 LED bulbs

Our Original Intention

With this tire inflator portable, we can save a lot of cost and physical strength every year, such as: when we go out, the tire is out of air, which makes us unable to reach the destination normally, saving us the time and money to go to the repair shop.Holidays can save us a lot of energy when using balloon decoration, including automatically inflating the swimming ring when swimming.

When you don’t know how much air pressure the inflatable device needs to inflate, you can set the maximum air pressure value to inflate. For example: a basketball swimming ring, you can set the air pressure to 149psi to inflate, and you can manually stop the inflation after it is full!

Bright LED lights

This air pump with emergency LED light will help you to check the safety of your tires in the dark night

Lightweight and compact

Easy to carry, our tire air compressor is not only small in design, but also has enough horsepower without taking up any space

AC/DC Two Power Modes

This portable tire inflator comes with two power cords (110V and 12V), making it easy to use on the road or indoors

Package Includes

1X Inflatable Host，1X Instructions，1x Fuse，1XAC Connector，1XDC Connector，3X Air Nozzle

【12V DC/110V AC Power Supply】YYTON air pump for car tires with a 12V car cigarette lighter plug as well as a wall plug for a 110V household socket, two ways of powering, ideal for indoor and travel use. We can use the wall plug when we are at home, and we can use the cigarette lighter car plug when we are outside, very convenient
【Strong Air Pressure for Quick inflation】The highest pressure of air compressor for car can reach 150ps. For car tire 195/60/R15 inflation from 0 to 36 PSI, it only takes about 4 minutes to complete the set pressure value. If multiple tires need to be inflated, we recommend allowing the air compressor to cool down for 5 minutes after 10 minutes of continuous operation
